name: Spooky Bird (1 Week Collaborative Project - Flappy Bird Style)
name_original: Spooky Bird (1 Week Collaborative Project - Flappy Bird Style)
description:
A flying pumpkin with bat wings has been seen around! (Player). Flap through the spooky neighborhood and use your lasers to destroy obstacles. The player will be able to slow time while in the game. Enjoy this flappy bird style game. To win the game, you need to survive for 10 minutes without dying.

This is a very simple one week collaborative project, the goal was to make a flappy bird style game with the Halloween theme.

This is the team behind the game! we did many tasks and had many hats but overall we are:

Jesus Fernandez Garcia (Uploader) - (2D Environment Artist) - (2D environment/background work. Platforms, destructibles, background props and general 2D art and level design. UI (HUD, several menu screens, pop-ups) 2D work for menus and slight blueprint tweaks).

Mark Plasencia (Programmer) - (All Systems/Programming/Blueprints you see in-game plus all game functionality + Level Design).

Connor Shipp (2D Character Artist) - (Main 2D Character Artists/Animation, Logo-Design, Laser Sprite Effects, 2D pickups Art, and more. General 2D Artwork for menu buttons and overall pumpkin style/main-menu aesthetic).

Special Thanks to David Zatopek for helping/showing us how to fix the Jump/Flap mechanics issue after the packaging. Thanks again David!

Project uses a royalty free laser sound, credits to SoundBible.

How To Play

Left Mouse Button - Flaps

Right Mouse Button - Shoots Lasers

Space Bar - Slows Down Time

Tab - Pause Menu

Pickup clocks to recharge your slow motion meter.

Beware of the laser meter.

More info below!

Project/Game made for Educational Purposes, fair use, not for sale!

We hope you enjoy the game and have fun! :)
